mapper.select: SELECT seq, email, content, board_seq boardSeq, write_date writeDate, del FROM ( SELECT row_number() OVER(ORDER BY write_date DESC) AS rnum, seq, email, content, board_seq, write_date, del FROM comment WHERE board_seq=#{boardSeq}) a WHERE rnum BETWEEN ${pageStart} AND ${pageEnd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (email, content, board_seq, write_date, del) VALUES (#{email}, #{content}, #{boardSeq}, NOW(), 0)
